parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filtering query string, in the format of "property:rule[:value];property:rule[:value];..."
Available rules: eq, neq, gt, gte, lt, lte, like, nlike, in, nin, isnull, isnotnull
Available properties: content

200.description: Schema for a paginated list of comments

requestBody.description: Request for AI chat. Either message (single turn) or messages (conversation history) must be provided. schemaType can be used to request structured output.

items.title: ChatMessageWithSchemaType
items.description: A message with optional schemaType metadata for identifying structured output

langfuseTraceName.description: This enables Langfuse telemetry. Several LLM call can use the same traceName and will be merged into the same trace in Langfuse UI.

langfuseOriginalPrompt.description: The original prompt that was used to generate the response. (Use prompt.toJSON())

functionId.description: This is the function ID that will be used to identify the LLM call in Langfuse UI. The Langfuse Span will be named after this function ID.

schemaType.title: ChatSchemaType
schemaType.description: Predefined schema types for testing structured output
